Text: ACCOUNT NOTIFICATION Margin email noticeLarry Campbell As a margin account holder you know how important it is to receive information about your account in a quick and timely manner One of the ways we notify customers about a margin call is with a letter but unfortunately that letter often arrives too late for timely action Thats why weve decided to stop sending regular mail notification of margin calls to our customers Email is the fastest way for us to notify you about a margin call We will continue to provide you with speedy email notification and are committed to steadily improving our already toprated email service Please check your inbox regularly and make sure that the email address we have on file for your account is current To update your email address online simply login to your account and select Settings from the Account Services pulldown menu Then click User Profile and follow the directions to modify your email address Wed like to remind you of your responsibility to remain aware of the status of your margin account at all times and to be prepared to take action as soon as conditions warrant Be fully aware that if at any time your account value falls to approximately equity or if market conditions warrant we reserve the right to close out some or all of your positions with or without notice at our sole discretion For these reasons it is imperative that you monitor your account on a regular basis If you have any questions please send email to or call Customer Support at UDATEK Please call if you are calling from outside of the United States Sincerely John J Mullin President Datek Online Brokerage Services LLC PS At Datek Online your privacy is our priority To view our Privacy Statement go to mudtkdaspelcampbelenroncom Legal and Disclosure Notices Customer Agreement High volume of trading and volatility may result in executions at prices significantly away from the quoted or displayed at the time or order entry System response and access times may vary due to market conditions system performance and other factors CCDA
